3.Summary: "My coworkers were fun, friendly, and helpful; also, I last worked here in the Spring of 2007."
3.Pros: Good schedule, consistent work, and nice coworkers. I enjoyed learning to cook and work quickly. This was a good job to do early in the morning because I am a morning person.
3.Cons: The beeping of all the machines can get a little annoying. Also, after you get done working you smell of fast food. And when you first get to work if you are working during lunch, there is a strong grease smell.

4.Cons: The manager was weird and rude

5.Pros: Was a good first job, what made it bearable was the people I got to hang out with.

7.Pros: Friendly staff and local town. I really like how everyone treats us here they are very nice and friendly. Super cool.
